Afriansyah (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1991), bụ onye Indonesian ọkachamara na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ maka Liga 2 club PSPS Riau
N'afọ 2018, Afriansyah bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na ụlọ ọrụ Semen Padang nke Liga 2 nke Indonesia.
Ọ bịanyere aka na Muba Babel United ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ na Liga 2 n'afọ 2019.
N'afọ 2021, Afriansyah bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ya na klọb Sriwijaya nke Liga 2 nke Indonesia
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na 6 Ọktoba 2021 megide Muba Babel United na Gelora Sriwijaya Stadium, Palembang.
